priorVersion.title: CDISC Questionnaire CHART-SF Interview Version Test Code Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C117987

self.title: CDISC Questionnaire CHART-SF Interview Version Test Code Terminology

definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique - Short Form Interview Version test code.
name: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique - Short Form Interview Version Questionnaire Test Code
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire CHART-SF Interview Version Test Code Terminology
synonyms: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique - Short Form Interview Version Questionnaire Test Code

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Interview Version - How many hours in a typical 24-hour day do you have someone with you to provide physical assistance for personal care activities such as eating, bathing, dressing, toileting and mobility? (hours paid assistance).
terms.preferredTerm: CHART-SF Interview Version - Paid Personal Care per Day

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Interview Version - How many hours in a typical 24-hour day do you have someone with you to provide physical assistance for personal care activities such as eating, bathing, dressing, toileting and mobility? hours unpaid (family, others).
terms.preferredTerm: CHART-SF Interview Version - Unpaid Personal Care per Day

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Interview Version - How much time is someone with you in your home to assist you with activities that require remembering, decision making, or judgment?
terms.preferredTerm: CHART-SF Interview Version - Cognitive Assistance at Home per Day

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Interview Version - How much of the time is someone with you to help you with remembering, decision making, or judgment when you go away from your home?
terms.preferredTerm: CHART-SF Interview Version - Cognitive Assistance Away From Home per Day

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Interview Version - On a typical day, how many hours are you out of bed?
terms.preferredTerm: CHART-SF Interview Version - Hours Out of Bed per Day
synonyms: CHSF1-Hours Out of Bed per Day

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Interview Version - In a typical week, how many days do you get out of your house and go somewhere?
terms.preferredTerm: CHART-SF Interview Version - Days Out of the House per Week
synonyms: CHSF1-Days Out of the House per Week

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Interview Version - In the last year, how many nights have you spent away from your home?
terms.preferredTerm: CHART-SF Interview Version - Nights Away From Home Last Year
synonyms: CHSF1-Nights Away From Home Last Year

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Interview Version - How many hours per week do you spend working in a job for which you get paid?
terms.preferredTerm: CHART-SF Interview Version - Hours of Paid Work per Week
synonyms: CHSF1-Hours of Paid Work per Week

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Interview Version - How many hours per week do you spend working in a job for which you get paid? (occupation).
terms.preferredTerm: CHART-SF Interview Version - Occupation of Paid Work

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Interview Version - How many hours per week do you spend in school working toward a degree or in an accredited technical training program?
terms.preferredTerm: CHART-SF Interview Version - Hours of Schoolwork per Week

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Interview Version - How many hours per week do you spend in active homemaking including parenting, housekeeping, and food preparation?
terms.preferredTerm: CHART-SF Interview Version - Hours of Homemaking per Week

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Interview Version - How many hours per week do you spend in home maintenance activities such as gardening, house repairs or home improvement?
terms.preferredTerm: CHART-SF Interview Version - Hours of Home Maintenance per Week
synonyms: CHSF1-Hours of Home Maintenance per Week

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Interview Version - How many hours per week do you spend in recreational activities such as sports, exercise, playing cards, or going to movies?
terms.preferredTerm: CHART-SF Interview Version - Hours of Recreational Activities per Week

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Interview Version - How many people do you live with?
terms.preferredTerm: CHART-SF Interview Version - Number of People You Live With
synonyms: CHSF1-Number of People You Live With

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Interview Version - Is one of them your spouse or significant other?
terms.preferredTerm: CHART-SF Interview Version - Live With Spouse or Significant Other
synonyms: CHSF1-Live With Spouse or Signif Other

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Interview Version - Of the people you live with how many are relatives?
terms.preferredTerm: CHART-SF Interview Version - Number of Relatives You Live With
synonyms: CHSF1-Number of Relatives You Live With

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Interview Version - How many business or organizational associates do you visit, phone, or write to at least once a month?
terms.preferredTerm: CHART-SF Interview Version - Associates Contacted per Month

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Interview Version - How many friends do you visit, phone, or write to at least once a month?
terms.preferredTerm: CHART-SF Interview Version - Friends Contacted per Month

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Interview Version - With how many strangers have you initiated a conversation in the last month?
terms.preferredTerm: CHART-SF Interview Version - Initiated Conversation With Strangers Last Month

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Interview Version - Approximately what was the combined annual income, in the last year, of all family members in your household?
terms.preferredTerm: CHART-SF Interview Version - Combined Annual Household Income Last Year

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Interview Version - Approximately how much did you pay last year for medical care expenses?
terms.preferredTerm: CHART-SF Interview Version - Medical Care Expense Last Year

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Interview Version - Physical independence subscore.
terms.preferredTerm: CHART-SF Interview Version - Physical Independence Subscore

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Interview Version - Cognitive independence subscore.
terms.preferredTerm: CHART-SF Interview Version - Cognitive Independence Subscore

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Interview Version - Mobility subscore.
terms.preferredTerm: CHART-SF Interview Version - Mobility Subscore

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Interview Version - Occupation subscore.
terms.preferredTerm: CHART-SF Interview Version - Occupation Subscore

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Interview Version - Social integration subscore.
terms.preferredTerm: CHART-SF Interview Version - Social Integration Subscore

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Interview Version - Economic self-sufficiency subscore.
terms.preferredTerm: CHART-SF Interview Version - Economic Self-Sufficiency Subscore

terms.definition: Craig Handicap Assessment and Reporting Technique-Short Form Interview Version - Total score.
terms.preferredTerm: CHART-SF Interview Version - Total Score
